segments.text: You ran the stop sign . May I see your driver's licence , please ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , I'm sorry . I didn't see the stop sign at the corner . I didn't mean it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That doesn't justify your violation . May I see your licence , please ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , sorry , I don't have it on me . Honestly , I forgot it at the house . But I have the insurance policy with me . Here it is .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , sir , your insurance looks good , but I still have to write you a ticket .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I understand , officer . I guess it's just not my day today . I will accept the fine .
segments.speaker: S2
